description: This file defines a class AppTheme that provides a static method to build and configure a ThemeData object used for consistent theming across a Flutter application. It sets up color schemes and theme properties such as app bar, navigation bar, scaffold background, and card styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class responsible for constructing the application's theme data with specified color palette.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Creates a ThemeData object configured with custom color schemes and UI component styles for the Flutter app.
